channel.title: PLAXIS News Feed
channel.description: Informing on the latest PLAXIS News

item.title: New release: PLAXIS 2024.2
item.description: This latest PLAXIS release includes two new user defined materials models to enhance tailings dams and design of tunnels in swelling rocks

item.title: Advanced technology benefits Melbourne commuters. Cuts project costs by $16m
item.description: Better cross-functional working and a digital strategy helped optimise delivery of this $11bn mega project which will cut travel times reduce pollution and boost efficiency for residents and businesses.

item.title: PLAXIS 30 years: pave the way for a promising future
item.description: 30 years of innovation at PLAXIS drove the geotechnical analysis industry.
